com.chaione.contexthub.sdk

Class ContextEventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chaione.contexthub.sdk.ContextEventManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callback<EventResponse>

    public class ContextEventManager
extends Object
implements Callback<EventResponse>
    The ContextEventManager class handles all context events. When a context event is received, it aggregates data from all the registered context services and the payload provider and sends the data back to the server along with the event.
